articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Chelsea vs Real Madrid in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: Chelsea vs Real Madrid: UEFA Women's Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: In a quiet corner of London a small group of extraordinary runners complete laps of an athletics track for a day and a night. Why do they do it? And how far do they go?
articles.title: Sri Chinmoy 24hr track race: Run around in circles for 24 hours

articles.description: Follow live radio commentary, score updates and match report from Celtic vs Twente in the Women's Champions League.
articles.title: Women's Champions League LIVE: Celtic v Twente

articles.description: England overcome significant setbacks to reach 96-1 in reply to Pakistan’s massive 556 on day two of the first Test in Multan.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Zak Crawley and Joe Root battle after Ben Duckett injury

articles.description: Cole Palmer is named the England men's player of the year for 2023-24.
articles.title: Cole Palmer named England men's player of the year

articles.description: Manchester City's Jack Grealish believes he should have been part of England's Euro 2024 squad and "can't speak highly enough" of interim manager Lee Carsley.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: I should have been part of England's Euro 2024 squad

articles.description: Chelsea defender Lucy Bronze says their Women's Champions League victory over Real Madrid is a good start but "playing like that, we won't win the competition".
articles.title: Chelsea 3-2 Real Madrid: Lucy Bronze says Blues 'won't win' Champions League 'playing like that'

articles.description: Spain World Cup winner Andres Iniesta retires from football at the age of 40.
articles.title: Andres Iniesta: Spain and Barcelona great retires from football aged 40

articles.description: Megan Schutt claims 3-3 as Australia brush aside New Zealand with a dominant bowling display to move top of Group A at the Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Australia thrash New Zealand as Megan Schutt takes 3-3 and Beth Mooney hits 40

articles.description: Both US captain Keegan Bradley and Europe skipper Luke Donald want fans to make next year's Ryder Cup at Bethpage Black "a fair place to play" for both sides.
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2025: Misbehaving fans at US v Europe contest in New York to be ejected
